profile.name: Sindre Sorhus
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering innovative solutions at Adobe
profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with a passion for command-line utilities, terminal graphics, and file system management. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and maintaining personal websites.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed multiple command-line utilities for Adobe's internal tools
Improved terminal graphics for Adobe's support platform
Developed a file system management tool for Adobe's content delivery network

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open-source projects, including stdin-discarder and supports-terminal-graphics
Developed a personal website using Astro

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of stdin-discarder and supports-terminal-graphics
Improved file system management for various open-source projects

command-line utilities: Designed and developed multiple command-line utilities using Node.js and Swift
Improved performance and efficiency of existing utilities
terminal graphics: Developed terminal graphics for Adobe's support platform using Electron
Improved user experience with visually appealing graphics
file system management: Developed a file system management tool for Adobe's content delivery network using Swift
Improved data organization and retrieval efficiency
